DOC.brief_title: Safety Effects Giving New HIV Vaccine ( GENEVAX-HIV ) HIV-Negative Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: In open-label study , volunteer give intramuscular injection GENEVAX-HIV vaccine use Biojector 2000 . Safety measure immune response assess accordingly .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria You may eligible study : Are 18 60 year old . Are HIVnegative good health . Are able understand infection HIV spread . Agree use effective method birth control study . Exclusion Criteria You eligible study : Have hepatitis B C. Have condition may prevent complete study . Are allergic bupivacaine , vaccine , certain local anesthetic . Have take certain medication receive certain therapy may affect immune system . Have immune system disorder receive therapy immune system disorder . Have expose HIV within 6 month prior study entry . Have receive experimental HIV vaccine experimental treatment within 30 day prior study entry . Have receive blood transfusion within 6 month prior study entry .
